string-array.name: landing_slide_subtitles
string-array.item: The new P1 is designed with photo-lovers in mind. Large photo views, photo filters makes your photo sharing smoother than ever.
Explore the world around you through images. Use the “Browse” and find pictures and people with similar taste. The community is waiting to be discovered.
Find and connect to your friends, follow interesting people and never miss what they are up to.
